dashboard.investmentToFocus: {{bullet}} {{equityType}} are furthest from it's goal percentage with {{distanceFromGoalPercentage}}%. Consider to prioritize this investment for a while.
dashboard.investmentOverbought: {{bullet}} {{equityType}} are beyond it's target by {{distanceFromGoalPercentage}}%. Consider to not invest more before it is closer to it's target.

accountModal.title: Add new account:
accountModal.firiAccordionTitle: How to get your Firi API-key
accountModal.kronAccordionTitle: How to get your Kron access key
accountModal.firiHelpText1: To get an API-key from Firi log in to your
accountModal.firiHelpText2: account. Then press your name at the top right-hand corner and press settings. In the settings menu press on "API" and then choose "Add ney key". In the box you have to copy the string under API key. This information will only show once so make sure it is copied. If you want to, make sure to check the permissions. Press "Change permissions" and make sure that the key only has read permission and not write permission to your account. The key you copied should be pasted in he textbox below.
accountModal.kronHelpText2: access key and account-ID you have to log in to Kron on a computer, and then press on the account you want to add.
accountModal.kronHelpText3: Then you have to open up the developer tools in your browser(this is usually opened by pressing F12 on your keyboard) and reload the page.
accountModal.kronHelpText4: Press the network tab and find the row called "portfolio-performances". Press on that row and and look further down. Under the request headers tab there should be a row called Authorization. Copy the value after "Bearer" which should be pasted into the kron access key field. In addition you have to copy the string after "/konto" in the url which goes into the kron account-ID field.
accountModal.e24HelpText4: the string "KR-KINGL" that is right above "Kron Indeks Global" that is the E24 ID for "Kron Indeks Global".
